DOC.brief_summary: The purpose randomize controlled trial examine whether evidence-based home visiting program enhance doula service effect positive parenting practice , breastfeeding , child maternal health outcome .
DOC.detailed_description: The goal study evaluate impact doula enhance evidence-based home visiting program young mother Illinois . Mothers intervention group receive home visit doulas pregnancy first week postpartum , doula provide mother support hospital labor , delivery , early breastfeeding . Additionally , mother intervention group receive prenatal long-term postpartum home visitation service evidence-based home visit program , Parents Teachers Healthy Families Illinois . Mothers comparison group receive less intensive case management service . Four exist doula home visit program locate economically distressed community Illinois select participation study . At site , young pregnant woman recruit participation study , provide informed consent , complete baseline interview home mid-pregnancy . At completion baseline interview , mother randomly assign either doula home visit intervention group case management comparison group . At 37 week pregnancy , 3 weeks- , 3 months- , 13 months- , 30 month postpartum , mother interview home topic include pregnancy , parent , health , mental health , feed practice , employment/education , relationship . Additionally , postpartum visit , mother videorecorded interact infant . At 13 30 month followup session , child study participant administer developmental behavioral assessment . Based prior study doula service goal doula enhance home visiting program , variety outcome assess followup time point . These outcome include prenatal medical care , prenatal bonding infant , feeling efficacy labor , anesthesia use labor , breastfeeding , positive parenting behavior , parent attitude stress , infant health , maternal health , maternal depressive symptom , child behavior development .
DOC.criteria: pregnant 12 34 week gestation live within catchment area program site age 1424 English Spanish speak ward Department Children Family Services ( DCFS ) supervision juvenile justice system plan give custody infant pregnancy result sexual assault
